name: http-bare
description: Super basic and completely useless bare http server, should be the theoretical upper limit in performance.

name: fastify
description: Validation is done using schemas and ajv. Schemas must be generated manually or using third party tools.

name: mikrokit
description: Automatic validation out of the box using @deepkit/types.

name: hapi
description: Manual validation using joi, or third party tools.

name: express
description: needs third party tools, or third party tools

name: deepkit
description: Automatic validation out of the box (The ones that made @deepkit/typesüëç). They have a RPC over webSockets that's way more performant than the http tested here.
